bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I live in a hive.
🍯 People eat what I make.
🌼 I fly from flower to flower.

bug.question: I hop and jump, and I'm green as can be. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy fields.
🎶 You might hear me sing in the summer.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots on my back.
🐞 My name has 'lady' in it.
🌱 Gardeners like me because I eat pests.

bug.question: I build tunnels underground and live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but strong.
👑 I work for a queen.
🧺 I carry food back to my home.

bug.question: I float on the wind. I was once a caterpillar, but now I have wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I start as a crawling insect.
🌈 I am often colorful.
🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I have a long body with many legs, and I crawl on the ground. If you touch me, I might curl up. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more than 10 legs.
🏠 I live in dark, damp places.
⚽ I roll up into a ball when scared.

bug.question: I fly around at night and am attracted to light. Some people think I’m a scary butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I'm active when it's dark.
💡 I love being near lamps.
🦋 I am related to a butterfly, but I have duller colors.

bug.question: I live in the water and zip around really fast. I have big eyes and like to eat other bugs. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I like ponds and streams.
👀 My eyes are huge.
🚁 I’m a good flyer

bug.question: I am a master of disguise. I look like a stick! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I live in trees.
🌿 I blend in with my surroundings.
📿 I'm long and thin, like a twig.

bug.question: I can make you itch, and I suck blood. I am very small and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I buzz in your ear.
🩸 I need blood to live.
🤕 I can leave a bump on your skin.

ocean.question: I wave but have no hands. Boats like to float on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm very big and blue!
⛵ Boats sail on me.
🐠 Fish live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce in my terrarium
🐌 I'm related to snails.

ocean.question: I am very big and gray, and I swim in the ocean. I can sing a song. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
💨 I breathe through a hole on my back.
🎶 I can be a Humpback

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink! What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I don't have any bones.
🎨 I can change color to hide.
🦑 I am not a squid but related

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, two big claws, and walk sideways. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I scuttle on the beach.
🦞 I am related to lobsters.
🍴I can be a hermit

ocean.question: I am long and thin, and I swim in a school. People like to eat me with rice. What am I?

hints.text: 🍣 I am often eaten raw in sushi.
🐟 I am a popular source of omega-3s.
🐈 Cats love my bones

ocean.question: I am a type of water that is very salty and makes it easy to float. What am I?

hints.text: 🧂 I am not fresh water.
🌊 You find me in the ocean.
🛀 Some people like to bath in me.

ocean.question: I am a home to many fish. Divers like to explore me because I am colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of tiny animals
🐠 I am teeming with life.
🤿 People come see me from around the world

ocean.question: I am a very big wave caused by an earthquake under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🇯🇵 I am named after a Japanese word.
🌊 I can cause a lot of damage to land.
⚠️ You hear about me when there is an Earthquake.

ocean.question: I am a small, sandy island that is surrounded by ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏝️ I am smaller than a continent.
🌴 You can find palm trees on me.
🏴‍☠️ Pirates often hide on me.
